attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although outlawed by the Wildlife and Countryside Act 1981, Burrow Blasting devices are being openly sold in the UK allegedly for blowing up empty burrows used by animals.  These devices are being used and marketed for the purpose of pest control and their use is inhumane and indescriminate.  The government must stop the sale of these devices forthwith to prevent further misuse.
